questiontext.text:
Exercise Øving

Classify the following \(3\times 3\) matrices. If multiple options are valid then choose the most restrictive option. Klasifiser følgende \(3\times 3\) matriser. Hvis flere alternativer er gyldige, velg det mest restriktive alternativet.

\(A=\left[\begin{array}{lll}\hfill 1&\hfill 1&\hfill 2\\ \hfill 1&\hfill 1&\hfill 1\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 1&\hfill 3 \end{array}\right]\), \(B=\left[\begin{array}{lll}\hfill 1&\hfill 0&\hfill 0\\ \hfill 1&\hfill 1&\hfill 0\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 1&\hfill 3 \end{array}\right]\), \(C=\left[\begin{array}{lll}\hfill 1&\hfill 2&\hfill 1\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 1&\hfill 4\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 0&\hfill 1 \end{array}\right]\), \(D=\left[\begin{array}{lll}\hfill 1&\hfill 0&\hfill 0\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 3&\hfill 0\\ \hfill 0&\hfill 0&\hfill 2 \end{array}\right]\)

Matrix \(A\) is: Matrise \(A\) er: [[1]]

Matrix \(B\) is: Matrise \(B\) er: [[3]]

Matrix \(C\) is: Matrise \(C\) er: [[4]]

Matrix \(D\) is: Matrise \(D\) er: [[2]]

correctfeedback.text: Correct answer, well done.

partiallycorrectfeedback.text: Your answer is partially correct.

incorrectfeedback.text: Incorrect answer.
